presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Competitive Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Competitive Revenue Line conversion rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Competitive Revenue Lines/# of Competitive Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Competitive Conversion Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Competitive Won Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Competitive Revenue Line Win rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Competitive Revenue Lines/# of Competitive Won+Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Competitive Won Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Competitive Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Competitive Revenue Line Loss rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Lost competitive Revenue Lines/# of Won+Lost Competitive Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Competitive Loss Rate
